body: Hello everyone. Straight to the problem. I'd like to incorporate the graph with the model in an attempt to make it a bit more visually pleasing (failed attempt below))). [](http://api.ning.com/files/XK6ftf7dlABGcH2RhP6KMcZN6kBCz6eAy6Q9a33tzQBK07EwP2qojs9bkqaqqMpYuydvr02tB**5iemkFQEePBwNJt5C31tW/LegendLocationError.jpg) What I want is to move the legend to the far right point, but it seems that I can't do it with Rhino point, nor with GH move component (see image below). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/XK6ftf7dlAD7SKHgF5xbGyaaIcWG3VHR7cocfEeSn-L8hYVqbvbHhW1P*NwhKV1lVWy8KhLPV57uWk9eWUttV*1bQdrniQOm/Canvasat132019.png) Is it a bug or am I missing something? P.S. Love Ladybug.
topic: Wind Boundary Profile Legend Location Error
